LanguageData.IP_OutputDesc: Processor will output {0}. It needs to be fed {1}
LanguageData.IP_CantFindThing: No items of that kind ({0}) found in this map
LanguageData.IP_BringIngredientsDesc: Bring ingredients to start the process
LanguageData.IP_CancelIngredientsDesc: Cancel Bringing Ingredients to this building
LanguageData.IP_IngredientImproperlyDefined: One of the ingredients has been improperly defined to work with the item processor, contact the mod's author
LanguageData.IP_NoPowerDestroysWarning: {0} needs to be powered to start working
LanguageData.IP_NoFuelDestroysWarning: {0} needs to be fueled to start working
LanguageData.IP_LightDestroysWarning: {0} needs to have an adequate light level to start working
LanguageData.IP_RainDestroysWarning: {0} needs to not be raining to start working
LanguageData.IP_TemperatureDestroysWarning: {0} needs to have an adequate temperature ({1} - {2}) to start working
LanguageData.IP_NoPowerDestroysInitialWarning: The result is spoiling due to a power failure in the item processor
LanguageData.IP_NoPowerDestroysMessage: The result has spoiled due to a power failure in the item processor
LanguageData.IP_GenericProductFinished: A product has finished processing and is waiting for pickup
LanguageData.IP_ProcessingInProgress: {0} is processing {1}. {2} will be ready with {3} quality in {4}
LanguageData.IP_ProcessingInProgressNoQuality: {0} is processing {1}. {2} will be ready in {3}
LanguageData.IP_RemoveProductDesc: Remove {0} from the {1}. The product will be ready at the present quality level ({2})
LanguageData.IP_ResetSemiautomaticDesc: This will reset the building after the current product is finished, so a new input ingredient can be chosen
LanguageData.IP_NoCombination: No combination found for these ingredients
LanguageData.IP_SetAutoQuality: Set quality for product extraction. When the product reaches this quality, a colonist will automatically retrieve it and carry it to an stockpile if available. If not set, products will be extracted manually, or at Legendary quality.
LanguageData.IP_QualityAutoEstablished: Auto Quality, product will be extracted at quality level: {0}
LanguageData.IP_ToggleAutoDesc: If set to active, this building will automatically grab ingredients from adjacent hoppers, and automatically start working again once the product is removed. If not, colonists will haul the ingredients to the building, and it will need to be activated manually once refilled
LanguageData.IP_ResetFullAutoDesc: Fully resets the machine and makes it stop. Warning, it will destroy the process and the input items
LanguageData.IP_OutsideLightRange: The process in this machine is being interrupted due to an inadequate level of light and will be spoiled soon
LanguageData.IP_SpoiledDueToLight: The product in this machine has spoiled due to an inadequate level of light
LanguageData.IP_ItRains: The process in this machine is being interrupted due to inclement weather and will be spoiled soon
LanguageData.IP_SpoiledDueToRain: The product in this machine has spoiled due to inclement weather
LanguageData.IP_WrongTemp: The process in this machine is being interrupted due to an unsuitable temperature and will be spoiled soon
LanguageData.IP_SpoiledDueToWrongTemp: The product in this machine has spoiled due to an unsuitable temperature
LanguageData.IP_TempRangeInThisMachine: . This fermenter needs a temperature between {0} and {1} ÂºC
LanguageData.IP_OverThreshold: Waiting for output to clear. Output limit is {0}
LanguageData.IP_NoRecipesHere: No modded recipes found for this factory
